posts.post_title: HOFs Beckley Bender (No Trees) & Clarke Portrait
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone, this is my first time selling on this site.  Please let me know if I leave anything out.  

I've completed the monster (521/524) and now I'm trying to upgrade. These are duplicates I've accumulated over the last few months.  I only accept Paypal ff.

Thank you,
Jim
